/home/xi/20170930ubuntu16.04所有使用技巧文档库/20171002CLion安装/clion-2017.2.3/bin/cmake/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" /home/xi/CppGrammer
